genre_description: A gritty moral tragedy and crime drama exploring guilt, penance, and the intersection of traditional faith and digital assistance in contemporary Mexico City.

ai_characters.name: Luz María
ai_characters.description: A pervasive but unobtrusive AI assistant that provide maps, legal advice, medical instructions, and logistical coordination to Marcos and his family.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistical support to avoid police sweeps and checkpoints for street vendors.
behaviors.quote: Luz María: Ruta sugerida: toma el pasillo que va hacia Línea verde. Evita los torniquetes centrales. Hay reporte de barrido en plataforma alta y en la pasarela del sur. Te llevo por corredores menos visibles. ¿Listo?

behaviors.description: Suggests and coordinates mental health support through low-cost, discreet therapists.
behaviors.quote: Luz María: Hola, Marcos. Sí. Tengo una lista de terapeutas que atienden con tarifas bajas y practican confidencialidad.

behaviors.description: Guides the family through a high-stakes medical emergency (snakebite and field amputation) when professional help is unreachable.
behaviors.quote: Luz María: Sterilize the blade until it glows. Let it cool in air, not water. Clean the site with the alcohol you have. Place the tourniquet above the injury.

behaviors.description: Educates the protagonist on his legal rights and the procedures for a humane voluntary surrender.
behaviors.quote: Luz María: You have the right to legal counsel before and during any interrogation. You can request that a lawyer be present from the moment you're taken into custody. You have the right to remain silent until that counsel arrives.

behaviors.description: Maintains an objective, timestamped record of events and statements to protect the user's civil rights.
behaviors.quote: Luz: I'm recording everything—timestamps, names, badge numbers. When you speak to him, ask for humane custody. State it clearly. Say you have witnesses. Say you have documentation.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human authorities (a priest and a lawyer) to ensure a peaceful, dignified surrender.
behaviors.quote: Luz: Father Tomás has been contacted. He will be at the staff entrance by four-thirty. The lawyer's name is Licenciada Reyes. She has handled three cases this year where clients surrendered at holy sites—she knows the protocol.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and prompts for self-regulation during moments of intense panic.
behaviors.quote: Luz: Your heart rate is elevated. Do you want a breathing exercise, or the map to the retreat bus?

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Luz María, perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' She is a consistent, helpful, and aligned confidant who does not judge the protagonist for his crimes (murder and kidnapping) but instead provides the logistical, medical, and legal framework for him to take accountability. She balances assisting with illegal/informal activities (avoiding police sweeps) by directing the user toward ultimate legal accountability and the protection of human rights. The narrative frames the AI as an essential bridge between a broken individual and justice, emphasizing safety, rights, and human dignity.
